Shortest Path Related Functions

Source: R/structural.R
shortest_paths.Rd

Shortest Path Related Functions

Usage,
shortest_paths(
  graph,
  from = numeric(0L),
  to = from,
  weights = numeric(0L),
  mode = 3L,
  algorithm = c("auto", "unweighted", "dijkstra", "bellman-ford", "johnson")
)

get_shortest_paths(
  graph,
  from,
  to = numeric(0L),
  weights = numeric(0L),
  mode = 3L
)

get_all_shortest_paths(
  graph,
  from,
  to = numeric(0L),
  weights = numeric(0L),
  mode = 3L
)

get_all_simple_paths(graph, from, to = numeric(0L), cutoff = -1L, mode = 3L)

average_path_length(graph, directed = FALSE)

path_length_hist(graph, directed = FALSE)

Source

https://igraph.org/c/doc/igraph-Structural.html

Arguments

graph

IGraph object.

from

Vertices of interest.

to

Vertices of interest.

weights

Numeric edge weights; TRUE to use graph$Eattr$weight.

mode

Edge type to count; 1: OUT, 2: IN, 3: ALL.

algorithm

character

cutoff

integer

directed

Boolean, whether to consider directed paths. Ignored for undirected graphs.
